variable.tooltip: sets the motor voltage at Speed Step 1, range 0(default - 02)-255, CV5
variable.comment: Range 0-255, 0 in CV 2, 6, 5 produces straight line acceleration
variable.label: Start voltage
variable.comment: Range 1-255, 0 in CV 2, 6, 5 produces straight line acceleration

variable.tooltip: Sets the acceleration rate (delay or momentum), range 0(default - 15)-255, CV3
variable.label: Accel Base Rate (CV3)
variable.comment: Range 0-255 - If the content of this parameter equals "0" then there is no programmed momentum during acceleration. (i.e., there will be no throttle lag

variable.tooltip: Sets the deceleration rate (delay or momentum), range 0(default - 15)-255, CV4
variable.label: Decel Base Rate (CV4)
variable.comment: Range 0-255 - If the content of this parameter equals "0" then there is no programmed momentum during deceleration.

variable.tooltip: sets the motor voltage at top throttle Speed Setting, range 0(default - 255)-255, CV5
variable.comment: Range 0-255, A value of 255 corresponds to 100%. 0 in CV 2, 6, 5 produces straight line acceleration
variable.label: Maximum Voltage
variable.comment: Range 0-255, A value of 255 corresponds to 100%. 0 in CV 2, 6, 5 produces straight line acceleration

variable.tooltip: sets the motor voltage at midrange throttle Speed Setting, range 0(default - 71)-255, CV5
variable.comment: Range 0-255 (default - 71), 0 in CV 2, 6, 5 produces straight line acceleration
variable.label: Midpoint Voltage
variable.comment: Range 0-255 (default - 72)5, 0 in CV 2, 6, 5 produces straight line acceleration

variable.label: Extended Address Low Byte
variable.comment: Default = 0 (Not part of a consist) Address range is 1-127 Add 128 to the address number to reverse direction of the locomotive.

variable.tooltip: Select for Random, Unselect for Sequential
variable.label: Play Mode while running

variable.tooltip: Select for Random, Unselect for Sequential
variable.label: Play Mode while stationary

variable.tooltip: Number of seconds to temporary stop, 0 - stop until normal DCC signal
variable.label: ABC Stop Hold Time
variable.comment: Number of seconds to temporary stop, 0 - stop until normal DCC signal

variable.tooltip: Sets distance covered until stop, specific to each loco(1-255)
variable.label: ABC Constant Breaking Distance
variable.comment: Sets distance covered until stop, specific to each loco(1-255)
Set Motor Control Algorithm/Auto calibration enable
variable.label: Set Motor Control Algorithm/Auto calibration enable

variable.comment: Selects Source of Motor Control settings

enumChoice.choice: 0: Internal motor control values for motor control (Stage 1)
1: Use the control parameter as defined in CV150-2 (Stage 2)

variable.label: Selects Source of Motor Control settings

variable.tooltip: Calibration result of the motor speed rise time
variable.label: Calibration result of the motor speed rise time

variable.tooltip: Calibration result of the motor speed fall time
variable.label: Calibration result of the motor speed fall time

variable.tooltip: Calibration result of most suitable motor BEMF Scale
variable.label: Calibration result of most suitable motor BEMF Scale

variable.tooltip: Number of additional BEMF sampling times in tuning mode
variable.comment: (0-40) Defines the additional BEMF sampling times in tuning mode (CV144=1)
variable.label: Number of additional BEMF sampling times in tuning mode
variable.comment: Defines the additional BEMF sampling times in tuning mode (CV144=1)

variable.tooltip: Additional PWM output time in tuning mode
variable.comment: (1-20) Defines the additional PWM output time in tuning mode (CV144=1)
variable.label: Additional PWM output time in tuning mode
variable.comment: Defines the additional PWM output time in tuning mode (CV144=1)

variable.tooltip: Volume of Locomotive Engine (Steam and Diesel)
variable.label: Volume of Locomotive Engine (Steam and Diesel)

variable.tooltip: Start Delay before brake release Diesels only
variable.label: Diesel Loco Start Delay

label.label: ABC Breaking Settings taken from Hornby HM7000 Manual
I don't have capability to test atm
Special Function Settings taken from Hornby HM7000 Manual
To include sound add a-1, b-2, c-4, d-8, e-16, f-32, g-64, h-128
Sets the sounds to be played when AFC is enabled (F28)
